value.0: Your specialist survival skills allow you to make various items. What would you like to craft?

Trap upgrade components add extra effects to traps which you choose to upgrade.

Which type of upgrade component would you like to create?

These small components add a sharp twist to your trap, inflicting pain in the legs of your enemy and causing them to move more slowly.

Are you sure you'd like to craft some Tangle Trap Razors for 1000 GP?

This upgrade increases the gas capacity of the trap, alowing the intense toxins to linger in the air for longer.

Are you sure you'd like to craft an Electrical Trap Coil for 1000 GP?

This highly desirable component makes your negative traps more potent by allowing them to sap more strength from enemies.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Negative Trap Lethargy Inducer for 1000 GP?

This component makes the corrosive agents in your trap more potent so they will eat a short way through protective armour.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Blob of Acid/Acid Splash Concentrator for 1000 GP?

This nifty upgrade makes your cold traps even colder than before, inflicting frostbite on enemies.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Heat Exchanger for 1000 GP?

This component propels minute drops of blessed water into the air, making it more difficult for undead enemies to strike their targets.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Holy Trap Purity Atomiser for 1000 GP?

This upgrade creates more intense vibrations when the trap is set off.  This causes a shock to an enemy's nervous system, making it more likely that they will be stunned.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Sonic Trap Shockwave Intensifier for 1000 GP?

This component allows a fire trap to produce both blistering heat and a pule of high air pressure.  This forces the heat into the lungs of enemies causing burns, and makes it difficult to breathe.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Fire Trap Compression Valve for 1000 GP?

This handy component boosts the electrical current of the trap, allowing secondary electrocution at a much greater distance.

Are you sure you'd like to craft an Electrical Trap Coil for 1000 GP?
Which weapon essence would you like to craft?

When applied to your weapon, this vibrating essence creates sonic oscillations which deal extra damage when striking your enemies.  After application, the essence stops vibrating and must be replaced.

Are you sure you'd like to craft an Auricular Essence for 500 GP?

When applied to your weapon, this magical toxin has the ability to harm living beings with its inherently negative energy.

Are you sure you'd like to craft Sourtooth Venom for 500 GP?

This corrosive substance can be used on your weapons to add acid-based damage.

Are you sure you'd like to craft Wyvern Bile for 500 GP?
Which explosive would you like to improvise using items from your immediate surroundings?

This amazing little device does no damage to creatures, but when triggered it creates an explosive gust of wind that will blow away harmful spell clouds.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Compression Grenade for 400 GP?

When thrown at enemies, this device explodes in a burst of force, spraying sharp debris all around.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Shrapnel Shell for 600 GP?

When thrown, this handy little device explodes in a flash of colors that confuse and deafen enemies.

Are you sure you'd like to craft a Kaleidoscope Bomb for 500 GP?
Which Potion would you like to brew?
Are you sure you'd like to brew a Potion of Fortitude's Essence for 500 GP?
Are you sure you'd like to brew a Potion of Nimble's Essence for 500 GP?
Are you sure you'd like to brew a Potion of Muscle's Essence for 500 GP?
Blob of Acid/Acid Splash Concentrator<StartHighlight>(1000 GP)</Start>
